Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Prepare two 8-inch round cake pans by greasing and flouring them.

Combine the cake flour, baking soda, baking powder, salt, ginger, cinnamon, cloves, and nutmeg in a bowl. Add shortening, brown sugar, maple syrup, and 2/3 cup of sour cream. Using an electric mixer on medium speed, beat the mixture for 2 minutes. Then beat in the eggs and remaining 1/3 cup of sour cream for another 2 minutes. Pour the batter into the prepared pans.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 30 to 35 minutes, or until the cake springs back when lightly touched. Allow to cool in the pans for 5 minutes before removing.
